name: Looting breakfast from a T-rex
description:
You, are hungry!!  

T-rex's have large eggs, large enough to feed a village. Looks like omelettes are on the menu for those brave enough to take them!

Now go out, find that egg and bring it back to camp and become a hero to all!

****************************************************************************

Controls : 

 Point and click to move.

Press 1, 2, or 3 to change your movement method, the slower the method, the less you get noticed by the T-rex.

****************************************************************************
